About Us

Comodo Nha Trang Hotel

Have you planned your vacation with your family yet?

If you love Nha Trang - an extremely beautiful and friendly coastal city, if you love a luxurious but equally cozy and comfortable space, if you need a trip to experience life in a genuine way Real and modern, Comodo Hotel will be an excellent choice.

Come to us, come to perfection, you will feel your own worth, we are not just a rest stop, moreover, with the service of a team of professional staff. business, will definitely give you, your friends and family a feeling of being in your own home. Welcome to Comodo Nha Trang

The coastal city of Nha Trang is entering the season with the most beautiful weather, the wind and the sun will not make you feel surprised, but on the contrary, will make you feel comfortable.

This is the time to travel to feel the full value of the central coastal region, with friendly and hospitable people. Moreover, when you come to Comodo Nha Trang, we will contribute to making your life much more meaningful. Go to enjoy - Come to experience.

The best room

Deluxe

Treat yourself to this spacious and contemporary deluxe room, with one king-sized bed or two twin beds, a sofa "Roman" style and a shower. The rooms have attractive South views over the ocean and many of these luxury hotel rooms can also be connected, making them ideal for families.

+ Balcony

+ Wireless Internet

+ Air conditioned

Of our customers

Attentive, enthusiastic staff. Beautiful view, the evening overlooking the Nha Trang sea is very shimmering. Clean, comfortable, warm room. Around the hotel there are many places of entertainment, entertainment and dining. It takes about 10 minutes if you want to walk to the sea. Thank you very much hotel!

Amanda Luis

Actress
